channel.title: [667] All Players Disconnect when someone logs out?
channel.description: Hi Whenever someone logs out all the players Disconnect. it is annoying for all the players and i am losing players because of it. has anyone got any ideas on how to fix it or what file i can fix it in? Thanks very much.
